fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Public Health, Banking and financial services
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
ITSector is a Software House acting in the following areas: 
 
* Specialized Outsourcing/nearshore: ITSector is investing in enlarge the outsouring and nearshore services. Itsector is a growing company in terms of human resources, and looks to attract the best people, trained and retain them. ITsector has developed an academy system to recruit and train collaborators. It also comprises training in English language. 
 
* Project development: always looking into different methodologies, technologies and accelerators to improve the project quality and reduce costs and risks. 
 
* International presence: create a wider international presence, through our solutions and services, based on local partners or direct contacts. Frequent presence in innovation events. 
 
* Omnichannel products: one of the main areas of specialization of the company that lead to the creation of the company ebankit 
 
* Products: develop innovative solutions based on the areas of work and opportunities in the market
